t: Choose the Best Colors for Your Amazon Product Packaging

t: Amazon Color Palette | HEX, RGB & HSL
s: July 23, 2021 - The hexadecimal color code for Amazon’s Orange is #FF9900 according to the many different sources listed below. When it comes to the RGB value of that color, you’ll have 66 red, 133 green, and 244 blue. In HSL, that is a hue of 217, 89% saturation, and 61% lightness. For any other of their brand ...
